mapper.select: SELECT "map_idx", "game_idx", "map_title", DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR("map_desc", 4000, 1) AS "map_desc", "map_theme", "created_at" FROM "maps" WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM "stages", "game_clear" WHERE "stages"."stage_idx" = "game_clear"."stage_idx" AND "stages"."map_idx" = "maps"."map_idx" AND "game_clear"."email" = #{email} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM "game_clear" WHERE "game_clear"."stage_idx" = "stages"."stage_idx" AND "game_clear"."email" = #{email} AND "game_clear"."success_yn" = 'Y' ) )
